original_title: Puccini: Turandot at the Forbidden City of Beijing
overview: Turandot at the Forbidden City is a 1998 live production of Puccini's opera Turandot directed by Zhang Yimou.  The opera was performed by Giovanna Casolla, Audrey Stottler, and Sharon Sweet alternating as Princess Turandot; Kristján Jóhannsson, Sergej Larin and Lando Bartolini as Calàf; and Barbara Frittoli, Angela-Maria Blasi and Barbara Hendricks as Liù, with Zubin Mehta conducting the Maggio Musicale Fiorentino.
title: Puccini: Turandot at the Forbidden City of Beijing
